title: Accessibility Features for Diverse Abilities
summary: As an older adult, I want accessibility features such as voice-to-text and text-to-speech so that I can easily interact with ALFRED without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.

title: Data Privacy and Security Compliance
summary: As an older adult, I want to be assured that my personal and health information is kept private and secure, so that I can use the ALFRED system without worrying about unauthorized access or breaches.

title: Simple Installation and Setup Process
summary: As an older adult, I want a simple installation and setup process for ALFRED so that I can start using it without feeling overwhelmed or confused by complex technology.

title: User Interface Adaptability
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want the ALFRED interface to adapt to my preferences and needs so that I can easily navigate and interact with the system without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.

title: Health Monitoring Integration
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to integrate with my health monitoring devices so that I can easily track my health metrics and receive reminders without feeling monitored.

title: Support for Multiple Device Platforms
summary: As an older adult, I want to access ALFRED on various devices like my smartphone and tablet so that I can use the assistant wherever I am and feel comfortable with the technology.

title: User Consent Management for Data Sharing
summary: As an older adult, I want to easily manage my consent for data sharing so that I can feel in control of my personal information and maintain my privacy while using ALFRED.

title: Integration with Health Monitoring Apps
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to integrate with my health monitoring apps so that I can receive personalized health insights and reminders without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.

title: User Feedback for Experience Enhancement
summary: As an older adult, I want to provide feedback on my experience with ALFRED so that the system can improve and better meet my needs without making me feel monitored.

title: User Support and Help Resources
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want access to simple and clear help resources so that I can feel confident using ALFRED without feeling monitored or overwhelmed.
